The default set of environment variables used for all tasks.

Source: R/zzz.R
DEFAULT_ENVVARS.Rd

These are chosen to provide the best general experience. The default variables may be overridden globally by setting the hipercow.default_envvars option, or on a per-task and variable basis by assigning a different value to the environment variable in question.

Usage

DEFAULT_ENVVARS

Format

An object of class hipercow_envvars (inherits from data.frame) with 1 rows and 3 columns.

On this page
